title: Linear Regression using TensorFlow.js
shortDescription: Predicts house prices from living space using TensorFlow.js in the browser.
description: A browser-based house price predictor built with TensorFlow.js and React. It uses linear regression to estimate prices from square footage, with an interactive UI and real-time visualization.

title: Binary Classification using TensorFlow.js
shortDescription: Classifies input into two groups based on living space size.
description: A work-in-progress browser-based binary classification model using TensorFlow.js. Currently building the UI and training logic to classify input data into two categories in real time.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal site where I share my projects, background, and what I enjoy building. It’s a space to explore my work, see what I’ve been up to, and get a feel for my frontend journey.
shortDescription: My personal site showcasing my work and background.

title: Fire Homes
description: A real estate marketplace built with Next.js and Firebase. Features include user authentication, property listings, filtering, and more. Built as part of a hands-on Udemy project.
shortDescription: Real estate app built with Next.js and Firebase.
